title: Define Project Scope and Goals
description: Clearly define the scope, goals, and features of PolyglotPalPro, considering both professional and corporate users.

title: Research and Select AI and Machine Learning Technologies
description: Research various AI and machine learning technologies suitable for providing personalized translations.

title: Design User Interface for Professional Users
description: Create a user-friendly interface that caters to the needs of professional translators.

title: Design User Interface for Corporate Users
description: Create an intuitive interface that caters to the needs of corporate users seeking translation services.

title: Design AI/ML Model Architecture
description: Create a model architecture for the AI/ML components of PolyglotPalPro.
dependencies: Research and Select AI and Machine Learning Technologies

title: Develop Translation Engine
description: Implement the translation engine that uses AI/ML to provide personalized translations.

title: Develop User Authentication and Authorization System
description: Create a secure user authentication and authorization system for professional and corporate users.

title: Implement Database Structure and Integration
description: Design and implement the database structure to store user data, translation histories, and analytics.

title: Set Up Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment Pipeline
description: Configure the CI/CD pipeline to ensure smooth integration and deployment of code changes.
dependencies: Develop User Authentication and Authorization System

title: Perform Initial Quality Assurance Testing
description: Conduct initial testing of the PolyglotPalPro application to identify any bugs or issues.
dependencies: Develop User Authentication and Authorization System
Set Up Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment Pipeline

title: Review and Address Feedback from QA Testers
description: Address any issues or feedback provided by the QA testers during initial testing.

title: Create Documentation for Users and Developers
description: Write clear documentation for users and developers to help them understand the functionality of PolyglotPalPro.
dependencies: Develop User Authentication and Authorization System
Set Up Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment Pipeline

title: Review Documentation for Clarity and Completeness
description: Review the created documentation to ensure it is clear, concise, and comprehensive.
dependencies: Create Documentation for Users and Developers
